capsules_submitted.utterance: I've noticed that the character Filch in our school is getting older. I mean, he's definitely an adult now, and it's kind of surprising to think about how much time has passed since we were kids. (CONFIRM)

He's always on the lookout for any kind of misbehavior or rule-breaking, which can be intimidating to students like us.
